As founder of a railroad company the user can turn a sleepy town with historical steam train into a vibrant metropolis with electric railways. The player has the chance to be the most influential tycoon with the best strategy within the endgame.<br><br><b>User Flow:</b><br>DOI<br>1. When the user clicks on the link in the<br>activation e-mail, or fills in the activation<br>code on himself, he / she is sent to the<br>website and receives a message that the<br>activation was successful.<br>3.1. The partner tracking pixel is<br>triggered at the moment of<br>activation.<br>The relevant entry can be found in<br>the source code for the HTML<br>page.<b><br><br>Target group:</b><br>- Player type: casual and core games,<br>- Gender distribution: 10% female, 90% male,<br>- Age group: 24-50 years old,<br>- Genre:<br><ul><li>Simulation/strategy</li></ul>- Similar games:<br><ul><li>Forge of Empires,</li><li>Anno Online,</li><li>Trainstation,</li><li>Skyrama,</li><li>The Settlers Online,</li></ul>- Literature &amp; Films:<br><ul><li>Around the world in 80 days,</li><li>The Time Machine,</li><li>Back to the future series,</li><li>The talking of Pelham 1, 2, 3,&nbsp;</li></ul><p><br></p><br>
